item.title: 杰森-莫莫亚（Jason Momoa）经过 12 年的谋划，终于在圣帕特里克节之前首次执导了爱尔兰最具标志性的健力士啤酒广告。
item.description:
After 12 years of strategizing a way to get himself onscreen with Ireland's most iconic stout, Jason Momoa made his directorial debut ahead of St. Patrick's Day for the newest action-packed Guinness ad — alongside a very special co-star. https://t.co/sjjSARIm65

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 罗布小学枪击案受害者的 18 岁妹妹将成为拜登总统周四国情咨文演讲的嘉宾之一。
item.description:
The 18-year-old sister of a Robb Elementary School shooting victim will be among Pres. Biden's guests for the State of the Union address on Thursday. https://t.co/J2W29ab8rG pic.twitter.com/0cC5DhBuRk

item.title: 周四，瑞典首相和外交大臣在华盛顿国务院交存了该国的 "加入书"，瑞典加入北约联盟的艰辛之路画上了圆满的句号。
item.description:
Sweden's arduous path to joining the NATO alliance came to a successful close Thursday, as the Swedish prime minister and foreign minister deposited the country's "instrument of accession" at the State Department in Washington. https://t.co/UGoLYAhIdm

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：高级官员称，拜登总统将在国情咨文中宣布一项 "紧急 "军事任务，在地中海加沙地带建造一个港口，以运送人道主义援助物资。
item.description:
JUST IN: During his State of the Union address, Pres. Biden will announce an "emergency" military mission to construct a port in the Mediterranean Sea off the cost of Gaza to get humanitarian aid in, senior officials said. https://t.co/qBjqkXkC6t pic.twitter.com/xHK6qx8FiF

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 一名男子被判定杀害了自己 5 岁的女儿，并将尸体转移了几个月，在她因谎报最后一次见到孩子时她在哪里而被判入狱一年多后，其分居的妻子周四获准假释。
item.description:
The estranged wife of a man convicted of killing his 5-year-old daughter and moving the body around for months was granted parole Thursday — more than a year after she was sentenced to prison for lying about where she was when the child was last seen. https://t.co/GwR1uQKLO3

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 美国联邦航空局（FAA）正在调查美国联合航空公司（United Airlines）一架航班的机械故障，该故障导致飞机起飞几分钟后从发动机尾部喷出火焰。
item.description:
The FAA is looking into a mechanical issue on a United Airlines flight that caused flames to shoot from the rear of an engine minutes after takeoff. https://t.co/CBKbOH3pMM

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 一名在南非失踪近三周的 6 岁女童的母亲已被逮捕，并被指控绑架和贩卖其女儿。
item.description:
The mother of a 6-year-old girl who has been missing in South Africa for nearly three weeks has been arrested and charged with the kidnapping and trafficking of her daughter. https://t.co/8DhfRAcuw3

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 瑞典正式加入北约，成为北约第 32 个成员国，结束了数十年的中立地位。
item.description:
Sweden has formally joined NATO as the 32nd member of the alliance — ending decades of neutrality — as concerns about Russian aggression in Europe have spiked following the war in Ukraine. https://t.co/CSxYwKrmsX pic.twitter.com/rVsLssrdZa

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: "我已经准备好迎接人生的下一个篇章和新的挑战。我在这里所做的一切都非常特别。但我认为，我之所以决定在这个时候宣布退役，只是想给自己一个了结，"克拉克说。
item.description:
"I'm just kind of ready for the next chapter and a new challenge in my life. And what I've been able to do here has been very, very special. But I think the reason I decided to announce it when I did was just to have that closure," Clark said. https://t.co/1YIomyKES6

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 西南航空正在推出全新的面貌，重新设计的客舱拥有更大的垃圾箱空间、设备支架、电源插座和高级飞机座椅。
item.description:
Southwest is launching a brand new look, with re-designed cabins featuring larger bin space, device holders, power outlets, and premium aircraft seats.

But despite the enhancements, travelers were quick to criticize after noticing one potential flaw. https://t.co/enHxrLlvlD

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 公用事业提供商 Xcel Energy 称，其设施似乎在点燃德克萨斯州潘汉德尔地区的大火中起了作用，这场大火已发展成为该州历史上最大的一场大火。
item.description:

item.title: 当局表示，警方正在搜捕周三在费城 SEPTA 公交车站开枪打伤八名青少年的蒙面枪手。
item.description:
Police are searching for the masked gunmen who opened fire at a SEPTA bus stop in Philadelphia on Wednesday, wounding eight teenagers, authorities said. https://t.co/jX76dhRf7e pic.twitter.com/cJAuKOjtGj

item.title: 美国食品和药物管理局（FDA）报告称，在美国销售的多种肉桂产品中铅含量超标，因此向消费者发布了有关肉桂的新安全警示。
item.description:
The FDA has issued a new safety alert for consumers concerning cinnamon after the agency reported elevated lead levels in multiple products sold in the U.S. https://t.co/jdpDVS78dg

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统将于本周四发表他的第三份国情咨文，其背景是国会和美国民众严重分裂的国际冲突--这使得总统最受关注的国情咨文变得更加重要。
item.description:
Pres. Biden will deliver his third State of the Union on Thursday against a backdrop of international conflicts that have sharply divided Congress and Americans — making the stakes for a president's most scrutinized address even higher. https://t.co/IhkQNbUnHU

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 联邦卫生官员说，美国一些折扣零售商出售的肉桂粉受到高浓度铅的污染，应予以丢弃。
item.description:
Ground cinnamon sold by some U.S. discount retailers is contaminated with high levels of lead and should be discarded, federal health officials said. https://t.co/7E6qqEBYX9 pic.twitter.com/aGtilJKean

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 去年在缅因州路易斯顿大规模枪击案中杀死 18 人的罗伯特-卡德 "很可能 "患有脑外伤，根据研究其大脑的医生的报告，卡德的家人公布了这份报告。
item.description:
Robert Card, the man who killed 18 people in the Lewiston, Maine mass shooting last year, “likely” suffered from traumatic brain injury, according to a report by doctors who studied his brain, and released by Card’s family. https://t.co/u0VJQHNzrK pic.twitter.com/pSByn6DMu3

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 美国上周的失业救济金申请人数没有变化，保持在一个健康的水平上，因为劳动力市场在利率高企的情况下继续表现出强劲的势头。
item.description:
U.S. applications for jobless benefits were unchanged last week, settling at a healthy level as the labor market continues to show strength in the face of elevated interest rates. https://t.co/l7QXhJvf9F

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 在美国股市总回报率中占大头的那一小部分股票，现在变得更小了。

item.title: 陷入困境的纽约社区银行（New York Community Bancorp）在今年股价暴跌超过 80% 后，于周三宣布从一群投资者那里获得超过 10 亿美元的救命钱。
item.description:
Embattled New York Community Bancorp announced a lifeline of more than $1 billion from a group of investors on Wednesday, after seeing its stock plunge by more than 80% this year. https://t.co/1PQV1Pn8Te

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 据警方称，一名 88 岁的空军退伍老兵光天化日之下坐在费城停放的汽车方向盘后，遭到致命枪击。

item.title: 周三，海关人员在泰国主要国际机场的托运行李中发现了 87 只动物，其中包括一只小熊猫。
